questions.question: What is the predominant color of the packaging's main text, prominently displaying the product name and dosage?
Considering the overall design, what is the primary shape of the container depicted (excluding the label itself)?
What is the texture implied by the visual representation of the packaging's surface, especially considering its matte quality?
Observing the label's text, what specific vitamin does the product contain, as a primary ingredient?
What is the release mechanism of the vitamin C, as explicitly stated on the packaging's main label?
What is the form of the supplementary product as displayed in the labeling and packaging, specifically as a unit of consumption?
Based on the visible text, what numerical value indicates the quantity of the active substance per unit of product, expressed in milligrams?
What is the color of the prominent brand logo present at the top of the label, characterized by its bold font and typography?
What is the background color of the branding, particularly encompassing the logo and brand name at the top of the packaging?
What language, in addition to English, is used on the label to describe the product's composition and other relevant details?
What is the overall tone or style of the packaging design, as observed in terms of its color palette and typography?
What word, in uppercase letters, is repeated on the top and bottom of the label, providing emphasis on the key feature of this product?
What is the brand name most prominently displayed on the packaging, clearly identifiable by font size and location?
What is the word following 'Vitamin' in the product's title, describing its release property?
Excluding the brand name, what word appears in bold, largest, and most frequently on the front of the product's container?
